headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 7 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump      Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Leybold D8A  Representive photo.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D8A
Pumping Speed 7.0 CFM (197.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-4(En) torr (4.00E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower 3/4 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 0.30 L (0.32 qt, 0.07 Br gal) Maximum: 0.90 L (0.95 qt, 0.20 Br gal)
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 9.0 A 5.0 A(2) 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.000 in (22.9 cm)
Depth 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Height 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Weight 65 lb (29 kg)
